column4: can anyone tell me why after i 'sudo apt-get upgrade' i get this message: 0 upgraded, 0 newly installed, 0 to remove and 0 not upgraded.
i'm sure it has something to do with the sources.list in /etc/apt - any ideas?
have you opened everything in the software properties?
might also be useful to add some of the unoffical back ports to your sources.list file.
